title: Number of outbound trips from China to Europe in 2018 , by region of destination
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Europe European Union, and Arrivals in millions in each Europe European Union on the y axis.
The Arrivals in millions is highest at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and lowest at Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
The highest Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has 4.81 more Arrivals in millions than the lowest Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Arrivals in millions for 4 number of Europe European Unions.
The Arrivals in millions is highest at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and lowest at Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Europe European Union, and Arrivals in millions in each Europe European Union on the y axis.
The Arrivals in millions is highest at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and lowest at Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Europe European Union in the x axis and Arrivals in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Arrivals in millions 5.93 is found at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and the minimum is found at Southern/Mediterranean Europe where Europe European Union is 1.12.
Second maximum Arrivals in millions is found at Europe European Union Western Europe.
The highest Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has 4.81 more Arrivals in millions than the lowest Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.

The Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has the highest Arrivals in millions, followed by Western Europe, and Northern Europe. Down to the Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe which is the lowest.
The lowest value 1.12 at Southern/Mediterranean Europe is almost 1.68 times smaller than the average value 3.53.
